While Steve Ballmer was vague about the reasons, analysts believed that the CEO had lost faith in Muglia's ability to lead the company into the next generation of enterprise computing. Our key conclusion from the management change is that Steve Ballmer feels that new leadership is needed to navigate Microsoft's evolution to the cloud, said Wells Fargo Securities analyst Jason Maynard .
